answers.answer: "then they told me i had low sugar"Tell us who "they" is. When was the test performed - before or after you ate?"now my sugar is 102 is prediabetis"How did you find this out?"i want to known if i am developing diabetes"You symptoms indicate you are. You also may have other health issues. You need to see a doctor and get tested for diabetes along with a CBC [complete blood check].
the doctors in the hospital told me i had it  was low 60my doctor told me my sugar level was 102 , before the test didn't ate anything so it shouldn't be in this range

I am still learning as  you are , same thing happened to me and your blood sugar level is less, mine was 112 and they said I wasnt Diabetic,I have found information here and from the other threads, scroll down, also I have googled for more input. .It sounds like your sugar level did drop and I have had that it can cause the symptoms you have described I believe its called hypoglycemia .,perhaps you hadnt eaten  enough that day .There are many books out there to help. Good Luck it is scary until you get more facts .
Fasting blood sugars between 100 and 125 are considered pre-diabetes. 126 and over are diabetes.

question: hi i am 24 year old suddenly one year ago i started frequent urination, thirst, dry mouth, nausea, constipation  went to the hospital because i got dehydrated a lot time so i ended up drinking most of the time gatorade so i dont get dehydrated. also feeling very tired. i remember after i ate i got really sleepy when it all started. then started with extreme shaking then they told me i had low sugar now my sugar is 102 is prediabetis. i want to known if i am developing diabetes or what it might be
title: maybe diabetes
